main event: On July 8, 1954, multiple children observed a UFO in Fullerton, Nebraska, describing it as a bright ship with pulsating lights that executed sharp maneuvers.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 7 to 10 minutes, The object was first seen to make a sharp turn and travelled a straight and level course, Three children aged 7 to 13 were confirmed witnesses and were described as having good eyesight, The children were interviewed by their older brother, who deemed them truthful, There were thundershowers in the area during the observation, with no wind or cloud movement.
sighted object: a bright ship with pulsating lights
witness description: children aged 7 to 13, siblings from Palmer, Nebraska
